overview: Flight memory is a film on false memories. The experience proposes to attend the scrolling of film transfers made from the 35mm trailer of the film Flightplan by Robert Schwentke. While projecting the idea of a mental dismantling (undergone by the main actress of the film), the video leads the spectator in a game of forgetting or reminiscing of a "déjà-vu" film.
title: Flight Memory
